QuestData.Title: The Lightbringer's Redemption
QuestData.CompletionText: How may I be of service, $r?
QuestData.RewardText: <Uther stares at the medal, speechless for a moment.>$B$BArthas' medal.$B$BI remember well the day I presented it to him...$B$BYou have done me a great service, hero. My soul may now rest in peace. I offer you a memory lost in time. Do with it as you please, but do not forget those that assisted you in this monumental feat.
